doc.title: My Friend Joan: A Conversation
doc.plot: When filmmaker Joan Copeland decides to make a documentary film on friendship, she invites long-term friend Ann Cruse to be the primary focus of the film interview. With no prior knowledge of the interview content, Ann is asked to respond to intimate questions about her 34-year friendship with Joan. Their conversation turns into a personal journey as the story of their relationship unfolds and the challenges of maintaining a lasting friendship come to light.
